BBEX3.A.TMT.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Turkmenistan / USD 1 = TMT ... (middle)
General: Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 2009 at the rate of TMM 5,000 = TMT 1; for exchange rates until 2008, see BBEX3:A:TMM:USD:CA:AC:A04. The manat is pegged to the US dollar.
Source: Central Bank of Turkmenistan, Ashgabat.
Methodology: Until 1998, calculated on the basis of month-end rates; since 1999, the manat has been pegged to the US dollar.
Comment on 2009: Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 2009 at the rate of TMM 5,000 = TMT 1.
